title: How to Understand Yourself Better | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community.   Subscribe to our Channel: http://bit.ly/2HP4F3h   Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by: Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact   You can submit your questions in advance to ama@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA   BOOKS MENTIONED The Laws of Human Nature by Robert Greene https://amzn.to/2S2f2on  [3:21] Principles by Ray Dalio: https://amzn.to/2QZUcWH [6:40] The E-myth Revisited by Michael Gerber https://amzn.to/2DAdHB9  [21:49]   PEOPLE MENTIONED Yuval Noah Harari: http://bit.ly/2DA2Kzu [1:52] Jordan Peterson: http://bit.ly/2FL6NMn [3:00] Robert Greene:http://bit.ly/2TvPWzF [3:20] Ray Dalio: http://bit.ly/2ORvSo0 [6:41]   QUESTION TOPICS   How to face the real you and understand who you are [2:00]   How to make sure you’re learning from your mistakes and recognizing the pattern so you learn each time [6:11]   How to make money and still do what you love [8:52]   How to handle a potentially severe mental health issue [11:20] What to do if you feel like your passion is becoming tedious and boring [18:31]   The most important skills to develop to become an entrepreneur [22:09]   What Tom learned at Quest [24:19]   How to figure out if someone is toxic (and why radical candor is so useful) [26:25]
